title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS I had ChatGPT turn my cats into humans. Very fun. How much more do you pay for organic produce? Some egg dyeing hacks. I forgot about malted milk powder. The 5 Best John Hughes movies. Trees with white flowers. How TJs bags became a status symbol in Japan. Every state’s favorite Easter candy. So many peep lovers! What’s Ina Garten’s favorite side dish? Why are the birds so loud right now? Squiggly lines help stop speeding? Restaurant chains are making changes in 2025. People enjoying the beach in the 1900s. Astrophotography is amazing. How Chinese characters work. Why do Canadians say eh? The best ways to clean your dutch oven. I love seeing women embrace their gray hair! Here’s some brunch inspiration for your Easter. Weekend baking: Raspberry Cream Cheese Coffee Cake Come check the pens I keep in my pen bag on Substack! The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: I Love Lists is a weekly roundup of the best links from around the internet, curated by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean. Discover inspiring reads, creative ideas, delicious recipes, and fun finds every week!
